title: [Krisstal's Magic Shoppe]
[Krisstal's Combat Gear]
[Krisstal's Armory]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A shell-lined bamboo counter and an aqua-hued seaglass display sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.
